entity.name: wiki
entity.query: select name, version, replace(datetime(round(time/1000000), 'unixepoch'), ' ', 'T')||'Z' AS time, author, text, comment, 'wiki_'||name as id, 'wiki' as source from wiki order by time asc

entity.name: ticket
entity.query: select 'ticket_'||id as id, id as ticket_id, 'ticket' as source, type, replace(datetime(round(t.time/1000000), 'unixepoch'), ' ', 'T')||'Z' AS time, replace(datetime(round(t.changetime/1000000), 'unixepoch'), ' ', 'T')||'Z' AS changetime, component, severity, priority, owner, cc, reporter as author, version as ticket_version, milestone, status, resolution, summary as name, keywords, description||group_concat(newvalue, ' ') as text FROM ticket as t LEFT JOIN ticket_change as tc ON t.id=tc.ticket and tc.field='comment' GROUP BY t.id
